title: HexTech chest

embed.description: GPU: GeForce GTX 1070 CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU @ 4.20GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM (15.93 GB RAM usable) Current resolution: 1920 x 1080, 70Hz Operating system: Microsoft Windows 10 Home

body: It's fourth day to play league, and you finally get that fat hextech key....... I open the chest and out comes a fucking penguin emote.               I only recieved a penguin emote. Who tf even uses emotes?

replies.body: It's random, you aren't guaranteed to get something good just because it took you a while to get a key.
